snippet: Carmelo Anthony returned to pour in 45 points, but the Amar’e Stoudemire experiment got off to a rocky start as the Knicks lost to Portland for their third defeat in the last four games.
abstract: Portland Trail Blazers beat New York Knicks, 105-100; Amar'e Stoudemire returns to Knicks in his first action since knee surgery in October, playing only 16 minutes and scoring 6 points.
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony returned to pour in 45 points, but the Amar’e Stoudemire experiment got off to a rocky start as the Knicks lost to Portland for their third defeat in the last four games.

headline.seo: Amar’e Stoudemire Returns but Offers Very Little For Knicks
headline.main: Stoudemire Returns but Offers Very Little
